Html:
Hello everyone,

I encountered the following problem.

I need to read out an excel document and add/alter some variables into the first sheet.
These variables are linked with charts and tables in other sheets.

One of the charts we use is a spider chart. 
After loading the excel and outputting the data into a new excel file.
Instead of showing the spider chart it shows a screenshot of a desktop. 

Is there a way i can load the spider chart so that this will show correctly. Or are there alternatives if any that could help show this chart.
In example is it possible only to load the first sheet and alter it while the rest stays unchanged?

I use PHPExcel 1.7.7 with PHP 5.3.3-7+squeeze8  

Thanks a lot in advance
